description: A tool concentrating on converting csv data to JSON with customised parser supporting
name: csvtojson

scripts.coverage: nyc --reporter html  mocha -r ts-node/register src/**/*.test.ts ./test/*.ts -R spec
scripts.test: rm -Rf .ts-node && TS_NODE_CACHE_DIRECTORY=.ts-node mocha -r ts-node/register src/**/*.test.ts ./test/*.ts -R spec
scripts.travis: nyc --reporter lcov mocha -r ts-node/register src/**/*.test.ts ./test/*.ts -R spec
